text: Payback (2015) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view produced by WWE that was held on May 17, 2015 at Royal Farms Arena in Baltimore, Maryland. It was the third Payback event. The event was free to new subscribers on WWE's monthly subscription service, the WWE Network. The main event saw Seth Rollins defeat Roman Reigns, Dean Ambrose and Randy Orton in a Fatal 4-Way match to retain the WWE World Heavyweight Championship. Rollins won by pinfall after a Pedigree to Orton. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times 1P R-Truth defeated Stardust Singles match 6:50 2P The Ascension (Konnor and Viktor) defeated "The Mega Powers" (Curtis Axel and Macho Mandow) Tag team match 2:50 3 Sheamus defeated Dolph Ziggler Singles match 12:20 4 The New Day (Big E and Kofi Kingston) (c) (with Xavier Woods) defeated Tyson Kidd and Cesaro (with Natalya) 2-1 2-out-of-3 falls tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 12:40 5 Bray Wyatt defeated Ryback Singles match 15:36 6 John Cena (c) defeated Rusev (with Lana) "I Quit" match for the WWE United States Championship 27:58 7 Naomi and Tamina defeated The Bella Twins (Brie Bella and Nikki Bella) Tag team match 6:13 8 Neville defeated King Barrett by countout Singles match 7:22 9 Seth Rollins (c) (with Jamie Noble and Joey Mercury) defeated Roman Reigns, Dean Ambrose and Randy Orton Fatal 4-Way match for the WWE World Heavyweight Championship; If Rollins did not retain the championship, Kane would have been fired from being the Director of Operations. 23:52 (c) – refers to the champion(s) heading into the match P – indicates that the match happened on the pre-show == References == ==Other websites== *Official Payback 2015 website Category:2015 in professional wrestling Category:2015 in Baltimore Category:Sports in Baltimore Category:WWE Payback Category:May 2015 events
title: Payback (2015)
